text:
The East Wing is bracing for an upcoming book by a former Melania Trump aide, a source says.

Stephanie Winston Wolkoff's "Melania and Me" bookends a summer of dishy Trump-related memoirs, including those from John Bolton and Mary Trump. https://t.co/2RA9t3lCdJ

name: CNN
text: In her new book, President Trump's niece — a clinical psychologist — delves into the President's family history and makes devastating claims about his mental state. #TheDailyDC podcast breaks down what the book means for the presidency and 2020 campaign. https://t.co/UaMBMgx6O1 https://t.co/MiAALRX65W

name: CNN
text: People with no obvious symptoms of Covid-19 ⁠— called "silent spreaders" ⁠— may be responsible for half of the Covid-19 cases in the US, a new study has found https://t.co/mILTTcqbpy

name: CNN
text: The US Food and Drug Administration has added five hand sanitizers to its list of products that have tested positive for a toxic chemical https://t.co/DEBVQFyP8U

name: CNN
text: The European Commission said it expects the EU economy will contract more sharply this year and take longer to recover from the coronavirus pandemic than previously expected, piling pressure on leaders to finalize plans for a huge recovery package https://t.co/CYWV2zMm9C

name: CNN
text:
Major League Baseball's 2020 season is set to begin on July 23 with a pair of games.

Every team will play a 60-game schedule entirely against teams in their own geographic region to limit travel. https://t.co/LcBi18aLzu

name: CNN
text:
A man was driving down the highway when he saw an eastern brown snake in his vehicle — a highly venomous reptile responsible for the majority of snakebite deaths in Australia.

He used a seat belt and a knife to fight it off while trying to stop the car. https://t.co/MMGkuEY6cc

name: CNN
text: A Muslim woman has filed a discrimination charge against Target after she said she received a drink from a Target Starbucks barista with "ISIS" written on the cup instead of her name https://t.co/p1FLBifCxR
